001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.DomainObject;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.EstimationFunction;
007
008/**
009 * Defines a training regime for machine learning models.
010 *
011 * <p>
012 * A {@code Regime} encapsulates the strategy used to train an
013 * {@link EstimationFunction} (such as a model or predictor) on a
014 * {@link DataSet} using a specified {@link ObjectiveFunction} and
015 * {@link Optimizer}.
016 * </p>
017 *
018 * <p>
019 * Implementations of this interface define the control flow of
020 * training — for example, how many epochs to run, how to split data
021 * into batches, or when to apply optimization steps. This allows
022 * experimentation with different training strategies without changing
023 * the underlying model, objective, or optimizer.
024 * </p>
025 *
026 * @see EstimationFunction
027 * @see DataSet
028 * @see ObjectiveFunction
029 * @see Optimizer
030 */
031@DomainObject
032@Strategy(Strategy.Role.INTERFACE)
033public interface Regime {
034
035    /**
036     * Trains the given {@link EstimationFunction} on the provided
037     * {@link DataSet} according to the specified
038     * {@link ObjectiveFunction} and {@link Optimizer}.
039     *
040     * <p>
041     * The training process typically involves iteratively evaluating
042     * the objective function on the training set, calculating parameterGradients,
043     * and applying the optimizer to update the estimation function's
044     * parameters.
045     * </p>
046     *
047     * @param <E>                the type of estimation function being trained
048     * @param estimationFunction the model or estimation function to be trained
049     * @param trainingSet        the dataset used for training
050     * @param objective          the objective function that defines the
051     *                           training loss and parameterGradients
052     * @param optimizer          the optimizer used to update the estimation
053     *                           function’s parameters based on parameterGradients
054     */
055    default <E extends TrainableFunction<N>, N extends Number> void train(E estimationFunction, DataSet<N> trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction<N> objective, Optimizer<? super E, N> optimizer) {
056        train(estimationFunction, trainingSet, objective, optimizer, 1);
057    };
058
059    <E extends TrainableFunction<N>, N extends Number> void train(E estimationFunction, DataSet<N> trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction<N> objective, Optimizer<? super E, N> optimizer, int step);
060
061}
